#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int z=0;
bool p[1000001];
long long int c[1000001]={0};
void prime(unsigned long long int a, unsigned long long int b)
{
	unsigned long long int i,j;
	//bool *p = new bool[b+1];
	for(i=1; i<=b; i++)
		p[i]=true;
	p[0]=false;
	p[1]=false;
	for(i=1; i<b; i++)
		if(p[i])
			for(j=i*i; j<=b; j+=i)
				p[j]=false;
	for(i=2; i<b; i++)
	{
		if(p[i])
			z+=i;
		c[i+1]=z;
	}
}
int main()
{
	unsigned long long int t,i,a,b;
	scanf("%llu",&t);
	prime(2,1000000);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%llu",&b);
		printf("%llu\n",c[b]);
	}
	/*
	for(i=1; i<=b; i++)
		printf("%llu:%llu\n",i,c[i]);*/
	return 0;
}
